personal.name: Dakota Radigan
personal.title: Senior Product Manager
personal.summary: Senior Product Manager with 5+ years shipping data-driven investment solutions and managing technical partnerships. Expert in validating client and operational pain points and translating them into functional specifications that drive measurable business impact. Combining deep investment operations knowledge with technical fluency (SQL, Python, AI) and a bias for action.

experience.description: Leading product strategy and technical partnerships for investment solutions at a leading direct indexing firm.
achievements: Led technical investment integration with Wells Fargo, aligning internal/external engineering teams to deliver pilot 2 weeks early—securing $32M initial AUM and a $3B+ pipeline
Launched new investment product MVP ahead of schedule; validated market needs and iterated rapidly to capture $75M AUM within 6 months of release
Shipped 3 high-impact features reducing manual client touchpoints on ~75k accounts
Architected a RAG-based GenAI assistant projected to autonomously resolve ~3,500+ annual email inquiries and slash response times for clients from hours to minutes
Established product analytics to monitor KPIs (time-to-onboard, adoption), identifying friction and pain points to drive data-backed roadmap prioritization

Appointed firm-wide 'AI Champion,' leading an 8-person task force to drive strategy. Increased Copilot adoption by 60% in 2 months and secured budget for dedicated engineering to scale custom OpenAI API solutions

experience.description: Drove product innovation and cross-functional alignment for investment platform features.
achievements: Awarded firm-wide 'Commitment to Excellence' for leading a scalability initiative that saved 2,500+ operational hours annually through workflow design and feature enhancements
Partnered with Sales on $200M+ in enterprise deals, acting as the technical SME to translate complex client requirements into executable engineering specifications and ops workflows
Built a SQL-based analytics framework to identify product usage gaps, enabling a targeted outreach strategy that increased feature utilization by 20% and directly informed roadmap prioritization
Chaired a cross-functional leadership council (Engineering, Ops, Sales) to break down silos and align priorities, reducing decision cycle times for critical execution items from weeks to days
Prototyped a Python-based self-service tool for the C-suite, demonstrating the viability of on-going digital service concepts

experience.description: Scaled direct indexing product suite and led platform configuration for new investment strategies.
achievements: Scaled the direct indexing suite by launching 18 new benchmark strategies within 9 months, leading platform configuration to drive $100M+ in new AUM
Wrote functional specifications for a digital onboarding portal, leading the engineering rollout
Engineered SQL reporting and heatmaps to diagnose bottlenecks and drive targeted CRM optimizations across Sales, Client Service, and operations

experience.description: Led account onboarding team and collaborated with engineering to build internal tools.
achievements: Led a team of 11 directly overseeing the strategic onboarding of $493M in assets (1,200 accounts), optimizing daily operations to improve onboarding times by 4 hours
Direct dotted line into Engineering as a QA Lead, launching two internal workflow tools that digitized manual tasks and significantly improved process reliability
Built SQL-based rule systems and Excel models to validate complex logic prior to implementation, reducing errors and provided onboarding metrics

projects.name: RAG-Based GenAI Assistant
projects.tagline: Enterprise chatbot resolving 3,500+ annual client inquiries autonomously
projects.description: Architected an AI-powered assistant for client service automation, reducing response times from hours to minutes through intelligent document retrieval and natural language processing.
highlights: Designed RAG architecture for semantic search over investment documentation
Projected to autonomously resolve 3,500+ annual email inquiries
Reduced client response times from hours to minutes
Integrated with existing client service workflows and CRM systems
projects.problem_solved: Client service team overwhelmed with repetitive email inquiries about investment accounts, causing slow response times and reduced client satisfaction
projects.impact: Projected 3,500+ annual inquiry resolution, response time reduction from hours to minutes

projects.name: Ben AI - Benchmark Eligibility Chatbot
projects.tagline: AI-powered financial advisory tool with semantic search
projects.description: Personal project: Built an enterprise-grade chatbot reducing financial advisor query time by 70% through intelligent benchmark search, iterative function calling, and real-time communication.
highlights: Implemented iterative function calling with safety guardrails (max calls, timeout protection, duplicate detection)
Designed semantic search using Pinecone vector database with custom embedding pipeline
Built real-time WebSocket communication with automatic fallback to REST API
Created Claude-inspired UI with smooth animations and responsive design
Architected modular backend with separation of concerns (services, models, routing)
projects.problem_solved: Financial advisors spent 30+ minutes researching benchmark eligibility requirements, leading to late-stage discovery issues
projects.impact: Reduced advisor research time from 30 minutes to under 2 minutes per query
projects.context: Personal project demonstrating full-stack AI capabilities

projects.name: SQL Analytics Framework

highlights: Engineered SQL reporting and heatmaps to diagnose bottlenecks
Enabled targeted outreach strategy that increased feature utilization by 20%
Directly informed roadmap prioritization with usage data
Monitored KPIs including time-to-onboard and adoption metrics
projects.problem_solved: Lack of visibility into product usage patterns led to misaligned roadmap priorities and low feature adoption
projects.impact: Increased feature utilization by 20%, data-backed roadmap prioritization
